reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Powerful Steamer in a Compact Package
reviews.reviewText: It has taken me a long time to settle on a travel steamer. I have read many reviews and considered different price point. I am pleased that I settle on this one. I was looking for something that I could travel with and not take up too much space in my suitcase. The Bear Steamer fit perfectly. My first use was on the trip that I am currently on as I am writing this review. The steamer is easy to use right out of the package. Fill with clean water, plug in. It heated up fast and works as designed. It was as effective the first go around, but that was operator error, yes me. Once I got comfortable with it was easy after that. Further, it steams for quite some time and never leaks. Love it! By the way, it is a steamer and gets very hot pay attention to your hand placement. I recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Purchased this on sale for $16!I’m rating this according to my needs for the steamer.— Heats up QUICKLY— Perfect size for travel— Works well and quicklyI need a steamer for normal usage for men’s shirts and an occasional crazy wrinkled piece of clothing that I didn’t get out of the dryer soon enough.I also needed it immediately to remove stubborn set-in wrinkles in new curtains I also purchased on Amazon. (Love these curtains, btw.) The curtains are thick and lined for thermal/blackout. To my surprise, this steamer quickly smoothed out the deep creases!I’m giving this 5 stars despite the 6’ cord being a little short, IMO, because it was SIXTEEN DOLLARS! Another nitpick of mine is it would be nice if I didn’t have to hold the button down the entire time while using it. Normally, I wouldn’t need to use it for so long though. I had six 52”X108” curtains to steam so my hand got cramped. I used a rubber-band to hold it down. I can definitely see the need to hold the button while in use as a safety feature so I’m not going to knock off a star…IT WAS $16! lolWould definitely purchase again and recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It ironed out the wrinkles on my shirt and sweater. Very easy to use and not big and bulky. Like a mini hair dryer!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Updated 8/10, much better—/ Had potential
reviews.reviewText: Update: the company reached out to me and provided me with a replacement. I’ve used it the same amount of times I used the other one and still works great. I do believe I had a defective one.I used it a few times and loved it, then it stopped working. Now I hear clacking noise and the water leaks. Of course I’m out of the refund period. Not sure if I got a defective one 🤷🏽‍♀️

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Update: Great Customer Service by this Seller regarding prior dissatisfied review
reviews.reviewText: UPDATE: I want to update my review - genuinely, as I am very appreciative to this Seller. They take customer service and their product reviews seriously. After seeing my dissatisfied review, they reached out and offered to replace it or reimburse me for my purchase, up to me - my choice. I didn't ask for that, as it was long past my Amazon return window. I opted for a replacement, as the steamer worked great on my first trip, prior to the unexpected issue -- I received the replacement quickly and have it packed for my upcoming trip. Thank you - A very satisfied customer!Do Not Buy this steamer.A fantastic concept - portable, fast heat up, easy to use but while it worked well on my vacation at the end of 2022. 2023 summer vacation 6 months later - 2nd use, plugged it in and was met with only a buzzing noise, no steam. 1x use is unacceptable - don't buy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Stopped working after first use! Waiting on replacement...
reviews.reviewText: Used this product once and was amazed by how well it worked. Heated up quickly and only took minutes to get wrinkle free clothing. However, stopped working the next time I went to use it. The whole unit becomes extreme hot to touch, no sound (as if motor isn't working) and no steam. Thankfully I'm still in return window. So opted to have steamer replaced instead of my money back and keeping my fingers crossed that the replacement one works more than one time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Hate to iron
reviews.reviewText: Love how quickly this heats up and how easy it is to use. I will never iron again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Really great quality
reviews.reviewText: I needed a steamer for my dorm and this was perfect. It’s a perfect travel size and works quite well. Obviously it doesn’t produce as much steam as a larger one would but for its size it works great!

The Portable Steamer is a game-changer for travelers who want to keep their clothes wrinkle-free on the go. Its lightweight design is a major plus, making it easy to pack and carry, and it's so compact that you can even bring it on a plane without any hassle.One of the most impressive features of this steamer is its ability to be ready for use almost instantly. It heats up really fast, saving precious time especially when you're on a tight schedule. This efficiency doesn't compromise its effectiveness; the steamer does an excellent job at removing wrinkles, making your clothes look freshly pressed in just seconds.The ease of use is another noteworthy aspect. It's user-friendly and gets the job done with minimal effort, which is a relief for those who aren't fond of the traditional ironing process.The fact that my girlfriend bought another one after our trip speaks volumes about its effectiveness and convenience. It's a must-have tool for anyone who wants to maintain a neat and professional appearance while traveling. Whether you're on a business trip or a vacation, this Portable Steamer ensures that wrinkled clothes won't be a concern.

Ich war zuerst etwas skeptisch wegen dem niedrigen Preis, war dann aber positiv überrascht wie gut der Dampfglätter funktioniert. Besonders die kleine Größe macht das Gerät so praktisch.Sehr empfehlenswert
Fa il suo lavoro , leggero , maneggevole e pratico
El producto es sencillo de usar y es pequeño para llevarlo de viaje
Bon... Soyons honnêtes, c'est juste un fer à repasser. C'est vrai que le design est plus pratique comparé aux fers normaux mais pas d'énorme surprise. De bonne facture cependant !
